mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_phone, me_email, me_authority) values(#{me_id},#{me_pw},#{me_name},#{me_phone},#{me_email}, 1)
mapper.update: update member set me_s_id = #{me_s_id}, me_s_limit = #{me_s_limit} where me_id = #{me_id}
mapper.select: select * from member where me_s_id = #{me_s_id} and me_s_limit > now()
